segments.text: In this drawing of a kitchen, I see the woman facing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate with care, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows from the basin, pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a slippery puddle around her, but she's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking thinking she might fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches on the unstable stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, her arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so innocent in their fun, yet it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a calm garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a peaceful view against this indoor turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for the family; accidents could ruin the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets drip with water, adding to the sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, it all turns out fine.
segments.speaker: PAR
